title: Barbie Movie Soundtrack #2: Songs From Barbie: Fairytopia
description:
As of March 2009, there are six unique soundtracks released for the Barbie films. I am in the process of obtaining and sharing them all. I will also continue to collect as more soundtracks are released.
I previously listed there being twelve, but I recently discovered they are German releases of radio plays. I don't think I'll be obtaining those in the near future...my German is nonexistent.

This album is the Original Cast Recording of "Barbie Live In Fairytopia". Although Melissa Lyons, the singer of Barbie in the other musicals, is not present for this album, but her replacement did a wonderful job. The songs are delightful and heart-warming. I like how a few songs reuse melodies as they visit similar themes throughout the story. I think the movie of Fairytopia would have progressed from mediocre to fantastic if it had been a musical. Mattel really missed out on sales for that one. ;)
Sadly, I do not yet have any video for "Barbie Live In Fairytopia". I did find some news about a possible DVD release. If it is in the works, I expect it to be released after the tours, so not to cut into ticket sales. :p Cross your fingers, guys!
I've also included the lyrics that came in the booklet. It includes just a few of the songs. When I have some spare time, I'll jot down the lyrics for the rest of the songs, too.

Songs From Barbie: Fairytopia
Track Listing:
{Act One}
1. I'm Flying
2. The Friends You Haven't Met
3. Laverna's Formula
4. Goin' To Azura's Castle
5. A Rainbow In Your Eyes
6. Rise Above It All
7. Laverna's Checklist
8. Stay Awhile
{Act Two}
9. The Friends You Haven't Met (reprise)
10. Ogin' to Laverna's Castle
11. Azura's Necklace
12. Laverna's Exit
13. I'm Flying (reprise)
14. Rise Above It All (dance mix)

Enjoy, everyone! A thank you would be wonderful. :D


***
I am missing these albums. If anyone has them and would like to help complete this collection, I would be greatly appreciative.
